captions.text: How long have I been on my own? Why does it still hurt?
It feels like the world is laughing at me
I‘m not proud, I’m vulnerable
You are the one who brings me down
Like waking up an iceberg, you slip away
You always know how
A smile from afar, the sea becomes rough
Once again, I smell tears on fire
You do love me, don’t you? Why can’t we hold it till the end?
Why don’t you dare? Why must we miss it?
The night is young, dream on dream on. You better not think about me
When the time is right, you will know how much it hurts
How you cherish those happy days
How you manage to give it all up
The moment our sweet dreams become real, they vanish
But I bid you goodnight
You love me the most, don’t you? Why can’t we hold it till the end?
Why don’t you dare? Why must we miss it?
The night is young, dream on dream on. You better not think about me
When the time is right, don’t tell me you are wrong
You better not think of me, madly
You still love me, don’t you? Why can’t we hold it till the end?
Why don’t you dare? Why must we miss it?
The night is young, dream on dream on. You better not think about me
Let the night hear you say: I love you
英文翻譯特別感謝: 周耀輝

comments.text: 13年看三只演唱会，给你全称直播，因为你没去。可是谁想到演唱会回来一个月就分手了π_π所有计划都被打破，只剩难过，一个人挺了几个月过来，后来觉得可以释怀了吧，但是听到这首歌还是忍不住会哭，会偷偷翻你微博，手指头自作主张的坏习惯，更没有办法爱着爱着就永远(┯_┯)两年都不够我来忘记你╮（╯＿╰）╭只希望你能过的好，我自己也要好。﻿

comments.text:
*Hebe Tien - Insignificance*
*Insignificance* is the Taiwanese singer Hebe Tien's third studio album 
released on 29 November 2013, which was *nominated* for *Best Album 
Packaging Award* and the single "Insignificance" for *Best Music Video 
Award* at  2014 25th Golden Melody Awards.  The album shortly had *won 
three "Best Album" and four "Best Female Artist" awards* less than six 
months after released; thus, becoming one of the most popular singer in 
Mandopop.

*Tracklist of the Album "Insignificance"*

1. "渺小" (Insignificance)
2. "矛盾" (Contradiction)
3. "終身大事" (The Most Important Thing In Life)
4. "不醉不會" (Learning From Drunk; except Mainland China Version)
5. "你快樂未必我快樂" (Uncertain Happiness)
6. "這個人已經與我無關" (He's Gone)
7. "你就不要想起我" (You Better Not Think About Me)
8. "無常" (Fickle)
9. "愛著愛著就永遠" (Forever Love)
10. "口袋的溫暖" (Hidden Love)﻿
comments.author: 李素華
